import Loader from 'react-loaders'; import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters'; import { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './index.scss'; const Contact = () =>{ const [letterClass,setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate'); const refForm = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_c7ucwko', refForm.current, 'nuNXmUqoj-OLuteLtnn0L' ).then( () => { alert('Message Success'); window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, Please try Again') } ) } return( <>

I'm looking for freelancing work. If you have any additional requests or questions, please contact me. Please do not hesitate to get in touch using the form below.

) } export default Contact;
